Module ua.leirimnad.lab2
Package ua.leirimnad.lab2

Class Timer

java.lang.Object
ua.leirimnad.lab2.SetClock
ua.leirimnad.lab2.Timer
public class Timer extends SetClock
Class representing a timer that goes off after a certain time.

  • Field Summary

    • set

      Parameters:
      to - true for setting, false for unsetting

    • pause

      public void pause(boolean to)
      Pauses or unpauses a timer. While paused, timer is not subtracting seconds from it's time left.
      Parameters:
      to - true for pause, false for unpause

    • getEndTimeString

      public static String getEndTimeString(long sec, FormatStyle formatStyle)

      Parameters:
      sec - seconds
      formatStyle - short, medium, long or full
      Returns:
      string representation

    • getDurationString

      public static String getDurationString(long sec)
      Returns a string representing duration of sec [h:]m:s format.
      Parameters:
      sec - duration in seconds
      Returns:
      string representation

    • doTick

      protected void doTick()
      Subtracts a second from timer and checks if it has to go off. For code use SetClock.tick().
      Specified by:
      doTick in class SetClock
